scripts.clean: rimraf dist bin test/coverage test/test-results.xml docs/.vuepress/public/js;
scripts.winBuild: rimraf 'dist/**/*.map' && mkdirp dist/css && mkdirp dist/js && mkdirp dist/fonts && mkdirp dist/documentclasses && mkdirp dist/packages && type nul > dist/documentclasses/.keep && type nul > dist/packages/.keep && xcopy /E /I src\css\ dist\css\ && xcopy /E /I src\fonts\ dist\fonts\ && xcopy /E /I node_modules\katex\dist\fonts\*.woff2 dist\fonts\ && xcopy /E /I src\js\ dist\js\ && copy src\index.d.ts dist\index.d.ts && mkdirp bin && lsc -bc --no-header -m embedded -p src/cli.ls > bin/latex.js && rollup -c;
scripts.linuxBuild: rimraf 'dist/**/*.map';mkdirp dist/css;mkdirp dist/js;mkdirp dist/fonts;mkdirp dist/documentclasses;mkdirp dist/packages;touch dist/documentclasses/.keep;touch dist/packages/.keep;rsync -a src/css/ dist/css/;rsync -a src/fonts/ dist/fonts/;rsync -a node_modules/katex/dist/fonts/*.woff2 dist/fonts/;rsync -a src/js/ dist/js/;cp src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts;mkdirp bin;lsc -bc --no-header -m embedded -p src/cli.ls > bin/latex.js;chmod a+x bin/latex.js;rollup -c;
scripts.devbuild: if exist NUL (npm run winBuild) else sh -c 'npm run linuxBuild'
scripts.devdocs: npm run devbuild && vuepress dev docs --no-clear-screen --debug;
scripts.docs: npm run build && [ ! -d website ] && git worktree add website gh-pages && mv website/.git .website.git && vuepress build docs && mv .website.git website/.git && cd website && git add . && git commit -m 'regenerated website';
scripts.testc: nyc --include=bin --include=src --include=dist -e ls --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=lcovonly --report-dir=test/coverage npx mocha -i -g screenshot --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test/test-results.xml test/*.ls && npx mocha -g screenshot --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test/screenshots/test-results.xml test/*.ls;
